conference.title: LaravelConf Taiwan 2018
conference.summary: As the biggest PHP and Laravel community in Taiwan, we are proud to announce [LaravelConf Taiwan](https://laravelconf.tw/) will take place on July 8, 2018.
conference.content:
As the biggest PHP and Laravel community in Taiwan, we are proud to announce [LaravelConf Taiwan](https://laravelconf.tw/) will take place on July 8, 2018.
Come and enjoy inspirational talks and making friends with enthusiastic developers like you!
Date: July 8, 2018
Location: No. 11, Zhongshan South Road, Zhongzheng District, Taipei City, 100 Taiwan
Check out [more information](https://laravelconf.tw/) and get your [ticket](https://laravel-dojo.kktix.cc/events/laravelconftw2018) now!
